item.g:title: Gamboge Orange Jute Cotton Woven Party and Festival Waistcoat
item.g:description: Gamboge Orange woven waistcoat, has a mandarin collar, sleeveless, full buttoned placket on the front, welt pocket on left side of chest, two welt pockets on the front waist.This is stitched and available upto size 44 inches.Shoes will be charged extra depending on their design.Accessories and Pyjama/Churidar/Kurta in the image is only for shooting purpose.There might be some color variation.Sizes will be assumed to be exact body measurements.
